lead_paragraph: Maria Sharapova defeated the two-time champion Kim Clijsters, 6-4, 6-4, yesterday at the WTA Championships in Madrid. In other matches, Svetlana Kuznetsova topped her fellow Russian Elena Dementieva, 7-5, 6-3, and the two-time winner Martina Hingis pulled out a 6-4, 3-6, 6-3 victory against Nadia Petrova.
